attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A land fill site at Movilla Road Newtownards is licenced to fill a disused quarry. For many years the operator has been filling land around the quarry to the effect that hills have developed around the quarry that were never there before. These 'hills' pollute  and spoil the countryside for local residents. The quarry is also being filled with domestic waste and the run off flows into a river which feeds the beautiful Stangford Lough. Dispite compalints the abuse continues. Photographs are available which clearly illustrate the change in the local environment.
